snippets.title: Card avec Chart Semi-Circulaire
snippets.description: Une carte avec un graphique semi-circulaire montrant la progression des tâches
snippets.yaml:
- Card:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: AutoLayout
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.Semibold
      Fill: =RGBA(246, 246, 246, 0.5)
      Height: =317
      LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Stretch
      LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
      LayoutGap: =20
      LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
      PaddingBottom: =20
      PaddingLeft: =50
      PaddingRight: =50
      PaddingTop: =20
      RadiusBottomLeft: =10
      RadiusBottomRight: =10
      RadiusTopLeft: =10
      RadiusTopRight: =10
      Width: =479
      X: =384
      Y: =220
    Children:
      - legend_chart:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: AutoLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None

            LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
            LayoutGap: =20
            LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center

            LayoutMinWidth: =32
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0

            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =298
            X: =97
            Y: =211
          Children:
            - left_legend_frame:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =28
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =16.884349822998047
                  LayoutMinHeight: =32
                  LayoutMinWidth: =32
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =120
                Children:
                  - left_legend:
                      Control: Circle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(113, 50, 251, 1)
                        Height: =23
                        Width: =23
                        Y: =2
                  - left_title_value:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: ="Inter"
                        Height: =33
                        LayoutMinWidth: =50
                        Size: =18
                        Text: ="Done"
                        Width: =80
                        X: =40
            - right_legend_frame:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =28
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =16.884349822998047
                  LayoutMinHeight: =32
                  LayoutMinWidth: =32
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =150
                  X: =169
                Children:
                  - right_legend:
                      Control: Circle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(217, 217, 217, 1)
                        Height: =23
                        Width: =23
                        Y: =2
                  - right_title_value:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: ="Inter"
                        Height: =33
                        LayoutMinWidth: =50
                        Size: =18
                        Text: ="To Do"
                        Width: =80
                        X: =40
      - content_chart:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: ManualLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
            FillPortions: =0
            Height: =195
            LayoutMinHeight: =32
            LayoutMinWidth: =32
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0
            RadiusTopLeft: =0
            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =393
            X: =49
            Y: =287
          Children:
            - img_chart:
                Control: Image@2.2.3
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                  Height: =195
                  Image: |
                    ="https://quickchart.io/chart?c=" & EncodeUrl("{
                      'type': 'doughnut',
                      'data': {
                        'datasets': [{
                          'label': 'foo',
                          'data': [50,50],
                          'backgroundColor': [
                            '#7132FB',
                            'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                          ],
                          'textcolor':['#000555','#555555'],

                        'rotation': Math.PI,
                        'circumference': Math.PI,
                        'cutoutPercentage': 75,
                        'plugins': {
                          'datalabels': { 'display': false },
                          'doughnutlabel': {
                            'labels': [
                              {
                                'text': '
Tasks',
                                'color': '#aaa',
                                'font': {
                                  'size': '32'
                                },
                              },
                              {
                                'text': '
20%',
                                'font': {
                                  'size': '44'
                                },
                              },
                            ]
                          }
                        }		
                      }
                    }
                    ")
                  Width: =379

snippets.title: Stepper avec Étapes
snippets.description: Un composant Stepper affichant les étapes et leur état
snippets.yaml:
- ctnSteper:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: ManualLayout
    Properties:
      AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.Regular
      FillPortions: =0
      Height: =125
      Width: =700
    Children:
      - galSteper:
          Control: Gallery@2.15.0
          Variant: Horizontal
          Properties:
            Height: =Parent.Height
            Items: =Table({Step:1,Name:"Step 1",Description:"Description"},{Step:2,Name:"Step 2",Description:"Description"},{Step:3,Name:"Step 3",Description:"Description"})
            TemplatePadding: =
            TemplateSize: =(Self.Width - (Self.TemplatePadding * (Self.AllItemsCount+1)))/Self.AllItemsCount
            Width: =Parent.Width
          Children:
            - ctnRec:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: ManualLayout
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(215, 58, 60, 1)
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                Children:
                  - recRight:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Height: =2
                        Visible: =If(ThisItem.Step = Last(Table({Step:1,Name:"Step 1",Description:"Description"},{Step:2,Name:"Step 2",Description:"Description"},{Step:3,Name:"Step 3",Description:"Description"})).Step,false,true)
                        Width: =Parent.Width/2 - ctnCircle.Width/2
                        X: =Parent.Width/2 + ctnCircle.Width/2
                        Y: =recLeft.Y
                  - recLeft:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Height: =2
                        Visible: =If(ThisItem.Step > 1,true,false)
                        Width: =Parent.Width/2 - ctnCircle.Width/2
                        Y: =ctnCircle.Y + ctnCircle.Height/2 - Self.Height/2
            - Container9:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Self.PaddingTop - Self.PaddingBottom
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                  LayoutGap: =10
                  PaddingBottom: =5
                  PaddingTop: =5
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                  X: =(Parent.TemplateWidth-Self.Width)/2
                  Y: =(Parent.TemplateHeight-Self.Height)/2
                Children:
                  - ctnCircle:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: ManualLayout
                      Properties:
                        AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Center
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        FillPortions: =0
                        Height: =40
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                        Width: =40
                      Children:
                        - imgSteperImg:
                            Control: Image@2.2.3
                            Properties:
                              Fill: =Color.Transparent
                              Height: =40
                              Image: |=If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), 
                                "data:image/svg+xml;utf8, "&EncodeUrl("<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 26 26' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
                                <circle cx='13' cy='13' r='12' fill='#003da5' stroke='#003da5' stroke-width='2'/>
                                </svg>")
                                ,"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, "&EncodeUrl("<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 26 26' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
                                <circle cx='13' cy='13' r='12' stroke='#101014' stroke-width='2'/>
                                </svg>"))
                              Width: =40
                        - ctnStepNum:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              Font: =Font.'Lato Black'
                              FontColor: '=If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), Color.White,Color.Black) '
                              Height: =Parent.Height
                              Text: =ThisItem.Step
                              VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Middle
                              Width: =Parent.Width
                  - Container5:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: AutoLayout
                      Properties:
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                        LayoutMinHeight: =0
                        LayoutMinWidth: =0
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                      Children:
                        - lblSteperName:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              FillPortions: =1
                              FontColor: =If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), ColorValue("#003da5"),Color.Black)
                              Height: =45
                              LayoutMinHeight: =0
                              LayoutMinWidth: =galSteper.TemplateWidth
                              Size: =13
                              Text: =ThisItem.Name
                              VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Middle
                              Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                              Width: =200
                        - lblSteperDescription:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              FillPortions: =1
                              FontColor: =If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), ColorValue("#003da5"),Color.Black)
                              Height: =45
                              LayoutMinHeight: =0
                              LayoutMinWidth: =galSteper.TemplateWidth
                              PaddingTop: =5
                              Size: =11
                              Text: =ThisItem.Description
                              Width: =200
